name: Edivolve
description:
How to Play:

Try to match your animal stats (bottom left) to the climate stats (top left).

To do this, click on EAT cards and then click on a FOOD card.

Every time you EAT, the competition stat will increase. Try to reduce this by using FIGHT cards.

KISS cards will multiply your final score.

EVENT cards will rerandomize the climate stats. Try playing this if you're stuck!

Click on NEW FOOD and then click a FOOD card to shuffle in a new food card.

Click on PASS to skip your turn.

You have nine turns to try to win!

If cards stop being drawn, reload the page. Should work fine but didn't have time to optimize the code before the deadline.

Press T to mute music.

A submission for the Respawn 2022 Game Jam.

Eat to evolve your animal to suit the climate!
